attributes.action: Ban all British and European far-right extremists, supremecy and Nazi groups, football hooligans and paedophiles to loose every right to own a British/EU passport and freeze all their international travel plans throughout their lifetime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of all British and European far-right extremist and supremecy and Nazi groups, football hooligans and paedophilles to loose every right to own a British/EU passport, face life-time bans of travelling in and out of the United Kingdom and outside Europe, and are publiclly identified, named and shamed via the internet, airports, seaports and national press of the UK, Europe and beyond.
